en.title: Congratulations! FusionExcel Sponsored Kedah Badminton Team Wins GOLD at SUKMA 2008!
en.content:
FusionExcel sponsored Kedah Badminton Team did exceptionally well at recent SUKMA (Malaysia Sports) Games held in Trengganu from 31st May to 9th June 2008. Photo show Foo Kok Keong, FE Spokesman and former World Badminton Champion with the Team after presenting them with Quantum Bracelets before the Games.

The Kedah Badminton Team Won the Following at SUKMA.

- Men's Singles, Champion ( Chong Wei Feng)

- Men's Team,Champion

- Mix Doubles, Runner Up ( Lim Khin Wah & Ooi Swee Wenn).

Congratulations!

meta.description: FusionExcel sponsored Kedah Badminton Team did exceptionally well at recent SUKMA ( Malaysia Sports) Games held in Trengganu.
meta.keyword: FusionExcel Sponsored Kedah Badminton Team Wins GOLD at SUKMA 2008, Men's Singles, Champion ( Chong Wei Feng), Men's Team,Champion, Mix Doubles, Runner Up (Lim Khin Wah & Ooi Swee Wenn).
